name: 狄雅南
objective:
本課程內容包括以分子熱力學的觀點來推導狀態方程式與活性係數模式，及有關相平衡的應用，統計熱力學原理亦將一併介紹。
The contents of this course include deriving the equation of state and the activity coefficient model based on the viewpoint of molecular thermodynamics and its application in phase equilibrium, and the principles of statistical thermodynamics will be also introduced.
schedule:
1. Thermodynamic Principles Review	
2. Thermodynamic Properties from Volumetric Data	
3. Intermolecular Forces	
4. Equations of State. I. Empirical Approach	
5. Equations of State. II. Statistical Approach	
6. Solution Theories
materials:
1. Prausnitz, J.M., Lichtenthaler, R.N. and de Azevedo, E.G., Molecular Thermodynamics of Fluid-Phase Equilibria, 3rd ed., Prentice-Hall Inc., Englewood Cliffs, N.J., USA (1999).
2. Chao, K.C. and Greenkorn, R.A., Thermodynamics of Fluids. An Introduction to Equilibrium Theory, Marcer Dekker, N.Y., USA (1975).
3. Van Ness, H.C. and Abbott, M.M., Classical Thermodynamics of Nonelectrolyte Solutions with Applications to Phase Equilibria, McGraw-Hill, N.Y. (1982).
4. Walas, S.M., Phase Equilibria in Chemical Engineering, Butterworth, Stoneham, M.A., USA (1985).
5. Sandler, S.I., Chemical, Biochemical, and Engineering Thermodynamics, 4th ed., Wiley, N.Y., USA (2006).
remarks: Students can ask any time through the i-Plus system or offline discussions at Chemical Engineering-411. This course will use English.*Online course will be offered depend on pandemic situation.
